typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	fileName as string ('reportingextract' + toString(currentDate()) + '.json')
}
source(output(
		users as (userId as string, firstName as string, lastName as string, phoneNumber as string, emailAddress as string)[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'singleDocument',
	wildcardPaths:['$fileName']) ~> MyDataFlow
MyDataFlow sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['@dataflow().fileName'],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
